content.text: As you scan the shelves of Jorge's fridge, you may notice something weird. He doesn't like cooking, but he loves vegetables. A basket with lots of tomatoes promises freshness, while a crisp container of enough lettuce is thought to add crunch to salads and wraps. A cluster of some onions resting nearby can be a fantastic addition to salads, providing a flavorful and aromatic punch. The only protein you will find in his fridge lands upon a carton containing many eggs.He loves hard-boiled eggs as addition to salads. Plus, you don't have to be a great chef to prepare them. Finally the fridge door reveals a collection of beverages, including plenty of orange juice, a lot of milk, some wine and a little water. This fridge is a collection of items awaiting nourishing possibilities, just don't expect to find any cooked meal
